subject: Television Sets and Media Devices
Football
Stadiums and Arenas
Light-Emitting Diodes
lead_paragraph: Daktronics, in Brookings, S.D., has become one of the largest makers of sports video displays as teams try to recreate the living room experience in their parks.
snippet: Daktronics, in Brookings, S.D., has become one of the largest makers of sports video displays as teams try to recreate the living room experience in their parks.
